com.cisco.pxgrid

Class GridConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cisco.pxgrid.GridConnection

  • public class GridConnection
extends Object
    A class clients must instantiate to connect to pxGrid. Before creating an instance, the client must configure the connection and pass the configuration on to the constructor. Once configured, the client can then actually connect by using either the connect method or using the ReconnectionManager class.

      • getRegisteredCapabilitiesList

        public List<RegisteredCapability> getRegisteredCapabilitiesList()
                                                         throws GCLException
        Get list of registered and enabled capabilities. Generates a query to the controller.
        Returns:
        List of registered capabilities.
        Throws:
        GCLException

      • getCapabilityStatus

        public RegisteredAndPendingStatus getCapabilityStatus(String name,
                                                      String version)
                                               throws GCLException
        Get status for requested capability. Generates a query to the controller.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of capability to query.
        version - Optional capability version to query. Version is ignored if it is null.
        reqStatus - Status of the topic from outstanding topic requests. This is valid only when there are pending requests.
        topicStatus - Status of requested topic from main topics table.
        Throws:
        GCLException

      • registerTopicChangeCallback

        public void registerTopicChangeCallback(com.cisco.pxgrid.internal.NotificationCallback appCallback)
        Register callback to be notified on topic status change.
        Parameters:
        appCallback - Callback to call on notification of topic status change.
